name: INE6514
short_description:
The system must allow the sending of requests to servers, and these should be met by one of the available copies.
 
Servers must run a service that does not imply any synchronization state between copies (for example, a query to ZIP code).
 
The implementation of the mechanism should allow the number of copies to vary, allowing the entry or exit of copies of the service dynamically.
 
The system can be implemented using any technology view along the course. The system architecture can be structured with any degree of centralization, ie, can be based on a central server that distributes the request to other servers, or be fully distributed.
summary: Mechanism for load balancing between replicated servers
